• If animals to be included in the calculation of genetic metrics were not indicated in the input file, IDs of breeding colony members may be manually entered here (IDs may be cut and pasted from a spreadsheet).
  • The processed pedigree file shown here will minimally include:
    • Ego ID, Sire ID, Dam ID, Sex, Generation, and Population columns
    • Other potential columns that may appear depending on information provided in the input file include: Birth Date, Exit Date, Age, Group, and Import columns may be present depending on the input file.
